description: An illustration of a Ferris wheel: each car is mostly shades of dark blue with a deep maroon triangle that represents the door and above each car is a light yellow triangle representing a type of canopy. The outer rim of the wheel is made up of various shades of red, orange, and yellow; the inner rim is made up of various shades of blue, green, and yellow, and the center of the wheel is a yellow and green circle. The spokes, the two support beams, and the thin triangles representing cables are all varying shades of deep red. The platform upon which the Ferris wheel stands is yellow, orange, and green.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
